welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oakwood, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at James Cox Dayton International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at James Cox Dayton International Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport provides a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers exclusive services for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities such as shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo shipments and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for efficient handling and storage.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.
